testcase.name: testDeposit_Success
testcase.system-out: 22:50:29.265 [main] INFO com.example.bank.service.impl.TransactionServiceImpl - Deposit successful for Account ACC100. Amount: 1000.0

testcase.name: testTransfer_Success
